meta_title: What are Fixed Assets? Operationalizing PP&E in 2026
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces back to poorly managed fixed assets. Learn how to operationalize your PP&E with Factory AI for 2026 manufacturing success.
title: What are Fixed Assets? A Definitive Guide to Operationalizing Industrial PP&E

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What are Fixed Assets? A Definitive Guide to Operationalizing Industrial PP&E

image_prompt: A wide-angle, photo-realistic shot of a clean, modern mid-sized manufacturing floor. In the foreground, a diverse group of three maintenance professionals (one woman, two men) are standing near a large industrial motor and pump assembly. They are wearing clean hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. One professional is pointing toward the machinery while another holds a ruggedized industrial tablet (showing only the back of the device). The background shows a well-organized production line with conveyors and overhead structures. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing a high-tech, efficient industrial environment. No text or logos are visible on the equipment or clothing. Full body shots of the professionals are visible.
